ETYMOLOGY: From Old English giet, giēat, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch nog and German noch.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: adverb: a word or phrase that modifies or qualifies an adjective, verb, or other adverb or a word group, expressing a relation of place, time, circumstance, manner, cause, degree, etc.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Up to the present time; so far; until now. Used in negative questions or statements to ask or say if something has happened.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 迄今；到目前为止；尚未。常用于疑问句、否定句或带有否定意义的句型中，表示某事是否已发生或尚未发生。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Have you finished your homework yet?

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: adverb: a word or phrase that modifies or qualifies an adjective, verb, or other adverb or a word group, expressing a relation of place, time, circumstance, manner, cause, degree, etc.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Still; in addition; besides; used to indicate that something continues or is repeated.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 仍；还；另外；又。用于表示某事仍在继续或重复。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: There is yet another problem we need to address.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我们还需要解决另一个问题。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: adverb: a word or phrase that modifies or qualifies an adjective, verb, or other adverb or a word group, expressing a relation of place, time, circumstance, manner, cause, degree, etc.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Even; still; used to emphasize a comparative adjective or adverb.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 甚至；还；更。用于强调比较级形容词或副词，表示程度的进一步加深。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The situation grew yet more complicated.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: conjunction: a word used to connect clauses or sentences or to coordinate words in the same clause (e.g. and, but, if).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Nevertheless; but; however; despite what has just been said or implied.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 然而；但是；尽管如此。用于连接两个有对比或转折关系的从句或句子。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: She has a difficult job, yet she never complains.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 她的工作很辛苦，然而她从不抱怨。
